caption: Authentication Token
description: The Authentication Token object represents standardized authentication tokens, tickets, or assertions that conform to established authentication protocols such as Kerberos, OIDC, and SAML. Use this object in authentication events to represent protocol-specific tokens: Kerberos Ticket Granting Tickets (TGT) and Service Tickets (ST), OIDC Identity Tokens and Refresh Tokens, and SAML Assertions. These tokens are issued by authentication servers and identity providers and carry protocol-specific metadata, lifecycle information, and security attributes defined by their respective specifications. When to use this object: Use authentication_token when representing protocol-specific authentication tokens in authentication events. When NOT to use this object: Do NOT use authentication_token for API tokens or client tokens used in API activity events - use token instead. Do NOT use authentication_token for generic API keys - use token instead.
name: authentication_token

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the authentication token.

expiration_time.description: The expiration time of the authentication token.

is_renewable.description: Indicates whether the authentication token is renewable.

type.description: The type of the authentication token.

type_id.description: The normalized authentication token type identifier.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The Authentication token type is unknown.
